Survivor Benefit Annuity
Do not count Survivor Benefit Annuity amounts paid by the Department of Defense (DoD) under
Public Law (PL) 100-456
to the surviving spouse of a Veteran who died prior to November 1, 1953, per
38 CFR 3.272(n)
.
Exception
:  The following DoD annuity payments are countable as income:
Survivor Benefit Plan (SBP) annuity payments
Minimum Income Widow/Widowers Annuity Plan SBP (MIW-SBP), and
Annuities for Certain Military Surviving Spouses.
Reference
:  For more information on
SBP, see
M21-1, Part XII, Subpart i, 4.C
.
